mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Platform ideal for web professionals and digital agencies managing multiple responsive websites. Supported e-commerce with product catalogs, payment processing, and inventory management.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Website builder specifically created for agencies and freelancers managing multiple client projects. Offered unique multilingual management system and team collaboration features that differentiated it from Wix's individual user focus.

mentionedBy.name: Wix
mentionedBy.notes: Specialized website builder for agencies and freelancers managing multiple client projects. One of rare platforms offering true multilingual capabilities with unique management system. Unlike Wix's individual user focus, Duda provides team collaboration and client management tools for professionals.
